Package alethinophidia.game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlethinophidiaActivity
    Main game class
    BuildConfig  
    GameLoopThread
    Main game loop, created as an additional thread controlled by GameView class
    GamePlayGenerator
    Main game play manager, that creates and controls game play elements such as SnakeCareCenter, ItemFactory, MapGrid and CollisionSolver.
    GameView
    GameView is the main Manager of entire app.
    IntroGenerator
    class solely created for the purpose of including intro sequence at the start of the app.
    MenuGenerator
    Main control center of in game menus (except for InGameInterface).
    R  
    R.attr  
    R.drawable  
    R.layout  
    R.raw  
    R.string  
    SoundGenerator
    currently WIP
